H3.text: who is playing halftime show super bowl 2018. Justin Timberlake

A4.text: Justin Timberlake headlined the Super Bowl LII halftime show in Minneapolis, Minnesota on February 4, 2018.

A5.text: Timberlake performed a medley of his songs featuring both the Tennessee Kids and the Minnesota Marching Band alongside him during the Super Bowl LII halftime show.
